author: Just Jared
title: Miley Cyrus Is Noah's Biggest Fan Girl at iHeartRadio Music Awards 2017!
text:
Miley Cyrus appears on stage to introduce a performance from her younger sister Noah Cyrus at the 2017 iHeartRadio Music Awards on Sunday (March 5) at The Forum in Inglewood, Calif.
The 24-year-old singer dressed up as the biggest fan girl to welcome Noah to the stage for her first performance at the an awards show. She wore an â€œI Heart Noahâ€ shirt and held up a similar sign.
â€œI am really excited. This next performer is, without a doubt, the coolest person I know. Her voice is amazing, her songwriting is beautiful and relatable,â€ Miley said. â€œShe knows who she is as an artist and I canâ€™t wait for the whole world to get a load of her vision. Sheâ€™s who I want to be when I grow up, and thatâ€™s saying a lot, â€™cause sheâ€™s younger than me. Get ready, because 2017 is about to be Noahâ€™s year.â€
Noah performed her song â€œMake Me (Cry)â€ with Labrinth and you can watch a clip below!
